name: Star Strider: Prototype
description:
This is a prototype/ proof of concept for a game that we are currently working on.

Story:

Aliens are attempting to take over the galaxy  and you are it's last hope!

Fight through waves of ships to get the highest score possible before you are inevitably  defeated by the sheer numbers of their army!

Controls:

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move

Z to shoot

 Hold X to charge super move

Press  X when your super move is fully charged to release it

R to restart game

Controller:

D-pad or Left Stick to move

Square or X to shoot

Triangle or Circle to charge and fire super weapon

Start to restart game

Important notes:

Different ships play differently

Ship color has no impact on gameplay

Grab blue powerups to increase the amount of bullets you fire per shot

Grab super weapon powerups to change your super weapon

Must have at least 1 controller connected to play 2 player

Credit:

Music: http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Some of the ships/ ideas for ships: https://medimongames.itch.io/pixel-spaceships-hd

Some of the SFX: https://outspacer.itch.io/platformer-sfx
